author: Timothy Linward
description:
Games Workshop has revealed a whole new army for Warhammer: Age of Sigmar, the Helsmiths of Hashut, a reimagining of classic Chaos Dwarfs from the Warhammer Fantasy Battle line. The faction will first be available in an army box set that contains a full Spearhead force and the faction’s new Battle Tome, followed by a second wave of reinforcement kits.

Continue reading Big hatted Chaos Dwarfs return to Warhammer after years in hiding
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Warhammer Age of Sigmar armies guide, Age of Sigmar Kharadron Overlords guide, Age of Sigmar Stormcast Eternals guide
title: Big hatted Chaos Dwarfs return to Warhammer after years in hiding

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Games Workshop has revealed seven new units for the Leagues of Votann, the most new kits since the army debuted in Warhammer 40k. The new kits will be accompanied by a new Leagues of Votann Codex for 10th edition, and an updated Combat Patrol.

Continue reading Warhammer 40k's Votann space dwarves reinforced by a truckload of new models
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: Warhammer 40k's Votann space dwarves reinforced by a truckload of new models

author: Chloe Ward
description:
If you're a Pokémon TCG collector, chances are you've experienced the thrill of hunting the most beautiful cards for your binders. Perhaps you've scored the Moonbreon from Evolving Skies? Or maybe you went hard on Crown Zenith, amassing a portfolio dedicated to the majestic cards from the Galarian Gallery? Some modern cards are truly works of art. Some, though... some will haunt me till my dying day.

Continue reading The most cursed Pokémon cards of all time
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon sets in order
title: The most cursed Pokémon cards of all time

author: Mollie Russell
description:
Dungeons & Dragons is a treasure trove of iconic creatures, so it makes perfect sense for monster mash board game Horrified to dream up a crossover. Horrified: Dungeons & Dragons is the brainchild of that collaboration. It’s a thematic co-op game that’s light on strategy and goes hard on unique, memorable monsters.

Continue reading Horrified: Dungeons and Dragons review - a beast without much bite
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games, Best family board games, Kids’ board games
title: Horrified: Dungeons and Dragons review - a beast without much bite

author: Matt Bassil
description:
What are the best MTG Commander precon decks? Precon - or preconstructed - decks are a great option when you’re just starting out in Magic: The Gathering's Commander format. Ready-made and fairly affordable, a precon guarantees you a well-balanced deck with a strong strategy, right out of the box. In 2025, there are tons of different options available - so we've summarized the very best choices here.

Continue reading Best MTG Commander precon decks 2025
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: Best MTG Commander precon decks 2025

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The Magic: The Gathering card Tombstone Stairwell has leapt up in value. This very odd card has been sitting at around $22 for the last year, but over the past month, and especially since July 12, it has risen to a staggering $95!

Continue reading 20-year-old MTG card that can never be reprinted spikes by 330%
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: 20-year-old MTG card that can never be reprinted spikes by 330%

author: Callum Self
description:
What are the best Pokémon packs to buy in 2025? Every new era of the Pokémon TCG brings fresh expansions, and picking Pokémon booster packs to buy can be a headache for beginners and old hands alike. Fortunately, we’ve curated this list of the best Pokémon TCG packs money can buy in 2025, prioritizing the best chase cards, pull rates, and of course, the latest set to buy from.

If you need background info on any of our booster pack recommendations, our complete list of all Pokémon sets tracks every single release since 1996. And for the absolute crème de la Pokécrème, read our updated guide to the world's most expensive rare Pokémon cards.

Continue reading The best Pokémon packs to buy in 2025<
title: The best Pokémon packs to buy in 2025

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Star Wars Legion's much anticipated new model for General Grievous riding a TSMEU-6 Wheel Bike is available to pre-order from the Asmode North America webstore, and will release on November 7. The sinister general is among a wave of upcoming releases for the Clone Wars era which had their launch dates and price points revealed this week.

Continue reading Star Wars Legion's Wheel Bike General Grievous hits pre-order, plus much more
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Star Wars board games, Star Wars Legion - release dates roadmap, Star Wars Shatterpoint review
title: Star Wars Legion's Wheel Bike General Grievous hits pre-order, plus much more

author: Chloe Ward
description:
The Dungeons and Dragons: Dragon Delves Anthology has only just released, and we've already found copies on sale for a chunky 20% discount at Miniature Market. Whether you're running the 2014 5E or the modern 2024 version of 5E, this anthology will take you on ten dragon-centred one-shot adventures – perfect for diving into the world of DnD without committing to an entire campaign.

Continue reading We've already found a great discount on DnD's Dragon Delves Anthology
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: We've already found a great discount on DnD's Dragon Delves Anthology
